


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.is -->

# ```js isArray ```


Check if the passed value is a js Array

## Parameters

- **value**  Mixed: The value to check



## Example (js)

```js
import isArray from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/is/array'
if (isArray([]) {
  // do something
}
```
